Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Cryptdin-13 (Crp13, cryp13, murine alpha defensins, 3S=S, natural AMPs; UCSS1a; mouse, rodents, mammals, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (97.14%) toCryptdin-8R:23%; C:17%, L:11%. Mol Wt:  4289.209; GRAVY: -0.79; Mol Formula: C174H297N65O45S8; mol ex coeff: 3355.Activity: killed 99.9% E. coli (4.7 ug/ml) and S. aureus (5.9 ug/ml) based on virtual colony count assays. This method exposed bacteria to peptides for 2 h in 10 mM phospahtate buffer before incubating in media for 12 h.
Literature Information.Author: Wang Q, Yang Y, Luo G, Zhou Y, Tolbert WD, Pazgier M, Liao C, Lu W. 2023
Literature Information.Title: Mouse alpha-Defensins: Structural and Functional Analysis of the 17 Cryptdin Isoforms Identified from a Single Jejunal Crypt.
